div.p:
IN LOVING MEMORY
OF KIM JONG-IL

p.span: Tensions are rising as the stand-off
and the rogue North African nation
as U.N. Weapons inspectors were once
again refused access to the country
I will take no options off the table.
And I mean what I say.
He did not know his mother,
The only son of the savage dictator Omar
Aladeen, he gain power at seven.
Often described as ignorant he changed

div.p:
Do you want
the Aladeen news or the Aladeen news?
The Aladeen news?
You are HIV-Aladeen.

People of Wadiya,
I come before you today

to tell you that the world shall
kneel before our great nation.

We are two months away from
enriching weapons-grade uranium...
...to be used for peaceful purposes.

It will be used only for medical
research and clean energy.
It will.

And will certainly never be used
to attack Is... Oh, boy!

p.span: does the Mad Dog of Wadiya

div.p:
Now, show me my nuclear weapons!
I can't wait!

This is the Beard of Doom rocket?
This is my weapon?

I will be a laughingstock! All my
friends have got nuclear weapons.

Even Ahmadinejad! And he looks
like a snitch on Miami Vice.

Where is the Head of my Nuclear
Program and Procurer of Women?

-Where is Nuclear Nadal?
-You had him executed, Supreme Leader.
Why did I do that?

-Supreme Leader!
-Nadal.

We are just months away
from refining weapons-grade uranium,

and we are set
to test the missile next week.

It is too round on the top.
It needs to be pointy.

Round is not scary.
Pointy is scary.

This will put a smile
on the faces of the enemy.

They will think that it is a huge
robot dildo flying toward them.

The shape of the missile top
has nothing to do with aerodynamics.

-It is about the payload delivery.
-It sticks in the ground and kaboom.

Perhaps some of your information
about bombs is coming from cartoons.

Nonsense.
I have been watching research films.

In this film, was there a duck who,
when the explosion happens,

his bill goes
around to the back of his head,

and then in order to talk,
he has to put it back this way?

There was somebody
who suffered a deformity like that.

I am now 100% sure
that you are watching cartoons.

Indulge me. For one second,
pretend that I'm an idiot.
Okay. I'm there.

Okay. You know what?
Let's just agree to disagree, my friend.
Okay.
What? Why? No!

-Don't you remember?
-Of course I remember!

How dare you question my memory?
I remember everything!

No, I would never do that!
I'm so sorry. I didn't mean that.

Don't worry, it's fine.
Well done, my friend.
Thank you.
Wait! Where are we going?

Admiral General, what if we just tell
the UN we have no nuclear weapons?

They'll lift the sanctions. We'll sell
oil rights to the Jalabiya desert.

Uncle Tamir. Do you not remember
what my saintly father
made me promise him on his deathbed?
It was never to sell Wadiya's oil.

You remember that was
when he gave me power
instead of you, the rightful heir.

You've been so cool about it.
Now, let's go back to the palace.
It's the season finale

of Real Housewives
of Shachahmahahfalimitahlicch!
Death to the tyrant!

We need to find a new double.
Because this one is...

I don't know
if he's going to get better.
No, sir. He's dead.

How 'bout looking in my eye
when I'm speaking to you?

It's very rude not to look at somebody
when they're talking to you.

It's okay.
You're having a rough day.

We shot the wrong man.
I can fix this. I have a new plan.

We need to find a new double
that can be manipulated completely.

I think we found
what you are looking for.

-You think this man looks like me?
-You have a very big barn.
You must have many happy goats, hmm?
What the fuck does that even mean?

Uncle Tamir, this thing is an idiot.
Why do you think he can do the job?

His only real job is
to be shot in the head.

Very well.
Put him through the process, okay?

Clip his nails, file his teeth, bleach
his skin, and shorten the penis.
Megan! Megan!
You now have herpes.

-Megan, you were worth every penny.
-You were super hot.

-Is my jet ready?
-Yes. Do you want to stay the night?

-I really want to do some cuddling.
-No. Your time is up.

I have to be with the Italian
Prime Minister tomorrow.

-Maroush, give the goodie bag!
-Thanks.

I trust everything is in there,
as your manager requested?

Katy Perry said she got
a diamond Rolex.

That's because she let me
Aladeen in her face.

You sure you don't want
to stay for some cuddles?

-No.
-But I really want someone to cuddle.

p.span: agrees to address the U.N. in person.

div.p:
Next. No, no, no. No. Boring,
boring. Come on. Come on.

Beloved Oppressor,
I have just received disturbing news.

Supreme Leader,
the United Nations demands

that you address their concerns
about our nuclear program,

or they will vote
to authorize military action.

Fine! I'll address this gathering
of snakes they call the UN.

We're going
to the Devil's Nest of America!

America! Build by the Blacks
and owned by the Chinese.

Supreme Leader, I took the liberty
of hiring some extra security.

-This is Mr. Clayton.
-I am here for your protection 24/7.

But in the interest of full disclosure,
I have to say I hate A-rabs.

Well, that's fine,
because I'm not an Arab.

You're all A-rabs to me,
the blacks, the Jews,

those blue tree-hugging
queers in A-vatar.

In fact, anyone from outside
of America is technically an A-rab.

While you're here, I highly recommend
a visit to the Empire State Building,

before you or one of your sand-monkey
cousins takes it down.

Supreme Leader, the suite has been
renovated to your specifications.

Twenty dollars a day for Internet?
What the fuck?

And they accuse me
of being an international criminal?

Beloved Oppressor, try to get some
sleep. Tomorrow is your big speech.

Nobody touch the minibar!
It's a rip-off!
Rise and shine.

-Who are you?
-We've actually already met.

-Hello, Aladdin.
-Clayton?

I'm being paid to kill you.
But I'm gonna torture you for free.

Are you serious?
Where'd you get those relics?

-From the Shah of Iran's garage sale?
-Yeah, right.

I know there's nothing more annoying
than a backseat torturer, but please...

-This is great stuff.
-That's like 1972, hello.

You won't be talking so much smack
with this up your butt.
That's the Anal Umbrella.

It's a good device,
but where's the splash guard?

You're going to kill me
and your white shirt.

-It didn't come with a splash guard.
-You gonna get chara on your trousers.

I can see it has a screw hole for one.
Apparently, I didn't get it.

All right, Mr. Smart Guy,
check out this bad boy.

-Not bad. The Kandahar Cock Wrench.
-So, now we're getting somewhere.

It's actually been banned
in Saudi Arabia for being too safe.

-This is totally depressing.
-Listen, just show me another one.

I don't even want
to show you anything anymore.

-Don't be like that.
-I don't think you wanna be tortured.

-I don't want to be tortured.
-You're taking all the fun out of it!

I'm gonna love the next thing!
I will be supportive.

All right.
This pours hot fire out on you.

The Fallujah Firehose!
Someone's got a friend in Syria!

-I am pretty proud of it.
-There is a new model, you know.

-I've got one that works by Bluetooth.
-Screw it. Screw it!

-I'm going to enjoy this now.
-No, don't. Please, don't!

No one will recognize
the body without this!

The Supreme Beard!
You will be cursed! Don't!
Come on! Why won't this catch?

Foolish man! There is no earthly
fire that could ever light...

The flames
of the righteous attack the unjust!

I'll be back with help!
J. K.! Just kidding!
My speech.

Average American shopper!
Give me your clothes!

Hey, hey, ho, ho!
Aladeen has got to go!

Hello. I am Admiral General Aladeen
to deliver my speech to the UN.

-Admiral, it's too hot for crazy.
-How dare you?

Tamir is coming right now.
You're going to be in big trouble.
Here he is. Tamir! Tamir!
Tamir, it was you, you snake!

He's not the legitimate leader!
He's not the legitimate leader!
He's not the legitimate leader!
He's not the legitimate leader!

You have rehearsed
the speech I prepared for you?

-Yes. But when is the General coming?
-He's feeling ill.

-Does he have worms in his shilshul?
-Very possibly.

Admiral General Aladeen preparing
to address the General Assembly of UN.

He's approaching the podium.
And he's walked right past the podium.

What is he doing?
You are making a fool out of me!

Let's bring in our UN Correspondent.
What do you make of that?

He's got their attention. Every eye
in the room is on him right now.
And he's returning to the podium.

And he's fallen off the stage.
What do you make of that, Denise?

He's clearly implying
that the UN must fall before him.

Drinking from the pitcher of water
directly, as opposed to the glass...
Again, it's another attempt to say:

"Listen, I'm not going
to play by your rules."

And he seems to have
a pitcher of urine out.

I believe he just urinated
in the pitcher.

-He is now drinking his urine.
-It looks to be his own urine.
Sorry. You want?

Trying to force it
on the Israeli delegation.
That is the ambassador.

He is dumping the urine
on the Israeli delegation.
That's a good one.
Okay, he's returning to the podium.

Much has been made of the
hostility between our countries.

With the help of the UM I will draft
a new constitution for Wadiya

and sign it in five days,
on Wadiya's Independence Day.
No, no, no.
No! Democracy? Never! Never!

The Wadiyan people
love being oppressed!
Dictatorship forever!
Come on! Come with me! Hurry!
Hello, person. Person.
Black person.

The double that you found is good.
He is almost as dumb as the real guy.

So, Wadiya will become a democracy.
China is a democracy, too.

Once that constitution is signed,
I will sell Wadiya's oil rights.

Gazprom, you will have control
of Wadiya's southern oil fields.
BP, you will control the north.

Exon, you'll have all offshore rights,
but you will not use BP's drilling rigs.

And, Mr. Lao of PetroChina, you will
have the lease on our shale reserves.

Some of those reserves are
in densely populated areas.
Then unpopulate them.

After you've paid me my 30%
finder's fee, of course. Gentlemen.

You're going to make billions.
What will you do with all those dollars?

I will buy the house on Lake Como
next to George Clooney's.

I love George Clooney!
He's an old-fashioned movie star.
He gay? He suck my dick?

No, those are just rumors.
Are you a homosexual?

No, it's more of a power trip with me.
Everybody has a price.

Tommy Lee Jones let me roll it in
my fingers for two hundred grand!

That was so crazy! I am
so honored to be able to help you.

Finally, somebody
who knows who I am.

You're the Wadiyan dissident who was
standing up to that asshole Aladeen.

It was so brave of you.
My name is Zoey.

-I don't care.
-What's yours?

-My name is Ala... son.
-Allison?

-Right. Allison.
-What's your last name?
Burgers.
Nice to meet you, Allison Burgers.

Allison, could you please
take your hands off my breasts?

Those are breasts?
I thought you were a boy.

-Where are you taking me to?
-To Brooklyn!

So, yeah, this is my store!
This is the Free Earth Collective.

We are a vegan, feminist,
non-profit cooperative operating

within an anti-racist framework
for people of all or no genders.

We are a pure democracy,
just like Wadiya's going to be soon!
Get me clothes, little man.

There's some in the Earthquake Relief
box in the lesbian bathroom, there.

We're the only store, other than
that fascist superchain Green World,

that sells
your nation's specialty fruit, mafroom,
which I know you people eat a lot of.

I hope that didn't come off
like a cultural stereotype.

Because I'm the furthest
thing for a racist.

I haven't had
a white boyfriend since high school.

-The darker races are less choosy.
-That came off as kind of offensive.
Thank you.

Anyway, let me give
you the grand tour.

Up on the roof,
we have this amazing organic garden...

-Do you sell any assault rifles?
-Wait. I got it. Humor. Right?

I took a feminist
clown workshop once.
Help! I'm trapped under a glass ceiling!

-What the fuck?
-I wasn't the best student, but...

-You seem educated.
-Yes. I went to Amherst.
I love it when women go to school.

It's like seeing
a monkey on rollerskates.

It means nothing to them,
but it's so adorable for us.

Allison, we'd love to have you
work here if you ever wanted to.

All of our employees
are political refugees, just like you!

There's Hannah over here.
She's from El Salvador.

She's a really
useful member of our team.

Useful as what?
A coat hanger?

-Come on.
-Allison, that's not funny.

Okay. I tell you what, get back
to work, Captain Hook! It's funny.

-No, it's not.
-Who's that?

Joteph is from a Sudanese tribe
that has no concept of money.
His entire village was ransacked.

Hey, Sub-Saharan! Could you
get me 100 child soldiers here by 5?

-No!
-Okay. Time out!
Shave your under-the-arms!

I dread to think what jungle
you have on your malawach!
That is very inappropriate.

Don't tell me what to say
and what not to say, little boy.

-You need to put that finger away.
-I won't put my finger away because...
Look, I got two fingers now!

If you do not stop using hateful
language, you cannot work here.

-All right. I promise.
-Okay.
I tricked you, Wolverina.
Justin Bieber's chubby double!
Hairy Potter!
Good-bye, old friend.

-When will the Supreme Leader be better?
-In time.

He's resting in his bedroom
and must never, ever be disturbed.
Time for bed.

Being Aladeen has its perks,
does it not?
Dropped your belt.

-What are you doing?
-She tried to milk me!
No. They are trying to pleasure you.

Allow the girls to use
their many talents.
No! Supreme Leader! The girls!
Girls, show him your bosoms.

Let me in!
I have 85 rooms at this hotel!

It's me, Admiral General Aladeen!
I lost my beard!

-Without pass, you don't get in.
-But I'm staying here!
I paid 20 dollars for the Internet!

How much do you charge
for assasinations?
Nadal?

Welcome to the Death
to Aladeen Restaurant.

You look very familiar.
Do I know you?
Sorry.

-So sorry, Supreme Leader.
-Don't worry. I'm 50% to blame.
No! No! Supreme Leader!

-Definitely not. I must be going.
-No, no. Stay, please.

If you hate Aladeen and you like
good food, this is the place for you.
Enjoy it.
No!
For you.

-What is your name?
-Allison Burgers.

That's a made-up name.
What's your real name?

-Ladis.
-Ladis what?
Ladis Washerum.

So your name is like the sign
"Ladies Washroom"?

That is made up. What's your real name?
I am interested. We are interested.

-Emploice.
-Emploice what?
Emploice... Muswashans.
That is a made-up name.

-Okay.
-What is your real name?

-Max.
-Max what?

Imumoccupancyu
One-hundred-and-twenty.

There's a number in the name?
Who are you?

-An Aladeen sympathizer?
-No, no, no!

It's Aladeen!
It's Aladeen without the beard!
Hasan, lock the door!
Wait, no! There you are, cousin!

This is my cousin.
I see you've all met him.

He's very simple and backwards.
I'm sorry.
It's okay, sit. Sit and eat.

Have a seat, cousin.
Very sorry. My apologies. Enjoy.

What are you doing here?
And what has happened to your beard?

I've been replaced by this body
double who's a total imbecile.

-How are you alive?
-How am I... Wait.

-You don't know?
-No.

Every single person
you had executed is still alive.
We all live here in Little Wadiya.

The executioner is
a member of the Resistance!

-You mean I never executed anybody?
-No. Like, honestly, zero people.

Nadal, you must help me
get back into power.

Why would I do that?
I have a perfectly good job here.

-I'm a Mac Genius!
-What do you do?

-Mostly, I clean semen out of laptops.
-Bravo. Living the American dream.

-Okay, I'll help you. On one condition.
-Name it.

You reinstate me
as Head of Nuclear Research,
so I can finish building my bomb.

-Deal.
-One last thing.

-I will build a round nuclear weapon.
-Never. It must be pointy.

-Wait a minute. This is...
-Okay. Deal.
Ladies and gentlemen of the press,

our Supreme Leader
is indisposed to answer your questions

as he is currently
drafting Wadiya's new constitution,

which will be to be signed in 3 days
at the Lancaster Penthouse Ballroom.

Thank you.
No further questions.

There's no way we're going to get near
this hotel without a security pass.

-Wait.
-What are you doing?

-Hiding from that lesbian hobbit.
-That woman, you know her?
It is a great honor

to be able to provide the catering
and the mafroom for this signing.
You just paid this month's rent!

She offered me a job.
Can you imagine that? Me? Working?
Hold onto that badge.

-That'll get you past security.
-Okay, thanks.

Wait, her company is catering the event.
She has a security pass!

That is the answer.
This is the plan.

You will take that job
and you will work for her.

I will get you
an identical beard and costume.

On the day of the event, you enter
the Lancaster as a member of her staff.

You will find the double,
switch with him,

then rip up the constitution
in front of the whole world.
Me? Work for that hairy titted yeti?

-Kimberly?
-Zoey.
Who cares?

I've come here to apologize
about some of the comments

I may have made about
Captain Hook and Blackie.
Great!

And I accept your job offer
as general manager.

-You can't be the manager, because I am.
-I can if I killed you.

-I think I'm starting to get you.
-All right, then... I will get you.
Great! Let's get you to work!
Hold on one second.

Hey, my man!
Excuse me. Hairnet!

I need a little
of the quinoa salad, please,

and throw a couple of extra
cranny-b's on top, if you could,

and I kind of need you
to hurry up, chief. Chop-chop.
Next!

-Occupied!
-Out. I have to clean. Out, come on.

Allison, can you take out
the garbage? Thanks.

Look! One of the customers
left a tip
of some Nair and some female razors.
Does anybody want to use it?

-Stop that.
-Suck it, loser.
Clean-up on aisle four!

Hey, buddy, I saw that. That is
very disrespectful to your leader.

Whatever, dude. Who are you,
Osama bin Laden's best friend?
No, he is not my best friend!

Though he has been staying
in my guest house

ever since
they shot his double last year.

Now the guy won't leave. I know why this
guy's the most hated man in the world.

You just have to go
to the bathroom after him.

Go to the bathroom after Osama, you'll
realize the true meaning of terrorism.
We're going to take this helicopter tour

and fly over the Lancaster
to spot its weaknesses.

We're just two ordinary American
tourists looking at the sights.

Don't worry, nobody gonna suspect
anything. It's a great plan.

-Don't arouse any suspicions.
-I am Wadiya's number one actor.

You don't win four Wadiyan
Golden Globes for nothing.
You do, you gave them to yourself!

My performance in "Aladeen Jones and
the Temple of Doom" was outstanding.

-I give it thumbs down.
-You seen "You've Got Mail Bomb"?

I've seen them all!
They're all terrible movies!
Listen! You are a terrible actor.

-Keep your performance small and real.
-All right, can you get me a cloak?

-Why?
-My guy would be wearing a cloak.

No, your guy wears an American flag
sweatsuit and a sheriff's badge.

-I need the sheriff's badge.
-For what?

-You're sheriff of American douchetown!
-That's rude.

We're going to walk over there,
act very inconspicuous.

-Okay. So, when we go to fly...
-Don't do that with your eyes!

You can't be
a Chinese person on this thing!

-I'm not chink, I'm Chinese-American!
-No, but you cannot hold your eyes!

Nobody is going to think
you're Chinese-American.

-It's racist, what you are doing!
-It's a fact.

They cannot pronounce their R's.
They pronounce them as L's.

-You know what "rabbit" is in Chinese?
-I don't speak Chinese.

-It's "labbit".
-It's not labbit!

"Who Shot Loger Labbit"
was a huge hit in China!

-I don't care. This is stupid. Okay?
-Okay, I'll do Filipino.

I like to work, I like to talk.
I like the shit, I do the kids.

Stop that. Your Filipino
is the same as your Chinese!
Now who's being a lacist?

I love being an Americans!
America is number one!

I am from U.S.A.!
My father also from U.S.A.

My great-grandfather fought
in the American Civil Jihad.

I am very proud to be an American.
I am America's number one douche.

-I've fooled them. Job done.
-How are things back at the Palace?

Fine, but guess
who's still living in my guest house?

-Bin Laden?
-Yes, Osama.

Bin Laden flooding the bathroom
every time he showers...

And how hard is it to put
a bath mat down, Bin Laden?

Hey, do you remember
my favorite sports car?

-You mean your Porsche?
-Yes... the 911.
911, it's the best!

So I was driving my 911 near
the palace one day and I crashed!

I've already ordered a new one.
A brand new 911 2012.

While you are here, you should
try to see some of the sights...

such as the Empire State Building...
and Yankee Stadium.

And I'd love to see the fireworks
over the Statue of Liberty.

Have your old back problems been
bothering you?

It's been terrible! It got so bad
that I made myself a back brace.

-Really?
-Yes, look, I'm still wearing it.
Hey, my English is getting good...

I bet I can count down from five
faster than you can!
Five, four, three, two, one!

-Allison! Are you okay?
-I... Yes.

You people, you make me sick! You
see a Middle Easterner on an aircraft

and you just assume
that he's hatching some violent plot?

Allison Burgers is a persecuted
dissident, not a murderous madman!

He was reported saying "Let's take
out the guards at the Lancaster."

-We deliver to the Lancaster!
-Good one!

Maybe he wanted to take
the guards out for a falafel!

That's a bit of a stereotype,
but I get the idea. Great idea!

-Is it a crime to care about your job?
-Yeah! Well, it is in Wadiya.

Where did you get your diversity
and sensitivity training? The Stasi?

Let's see how you feel about racial
profiling when white people...

And I know what I'm talking about
because I majored in Fem Lit!
Come on.

Hey! What are you doing?
Where are you going?

Don't worry! Just suck the fatoot
of the biggest guy, you'll be fine.

-The police here are such fascists!
-And not in a good way.

-It just makes me so mad!
-Zoey, you were great back there.

Thanks. I just feel so sorry
that wherever you go in the world,
you're the victim of police abuse.

Come here. I'm just so sorry!
You're okay now. Alright?

And I'm not gonna
let anything bad happen to you.

Let's get you back to the collective.
Come on.
No, a bit more.

-Come on, let's go.
-I feel so sad!

-Let's do another hug, okay?
-Allison, why are you sad?

-The brutality?
-Did you suffer from sexual abuse?

Yes, they raped me in
a very unprofessional way.

Oh, no. We have
to get you to the Rape Center.

You have a center for rape here?
Great! I'd love to go!

Maybe another time. Hire a limo, have
some cocktails, bring my raping shoes.

p.span: It was the tour from hell...

div.p:
Look, Supreme Leader
is on the talking painting!

p.span: of the Manhattan skyline was cut short

div.p:
by what police are now calling
a "terrorism misunderstanding",

involving a man named
Emer Gencyexitonly.

Maroush, double the security
around the hotel.
The signing must not be disrupted.

That guy from the Lancaster's
coming tomorrow morning,

take the mafroom downstairs
and make some a nice display.
I just want everything to be perfect.

-Zoey?
-Allison. Hi.

To thank you for what you did
today at the police station,

I've decided
to bestow upon you a gift.
That's sweet. What is it?

-I don't know what that is.
-It's fine.

Oh! No!
No, I am not going to do that.

I'm getting a lot of this
and not much of this...

Listen, I understand
that you're having urges, okay?

But you need to take care
of them by yourself.

-Myself? What? How?
-You need to touch yourself.

I don't touch myself.
Do you touch yourself?
I think most healthy people do, yes.

You touch your own malawach?
Disgusting! Yuck!

Stop joking, all right?
You've never jerked off?

-Okay, come with me.
-You taking me to the Rape Center?

-This is silly.
-Okay.

Take your penis out
and put it in your hands.
This is silly.

Now, slowly move your hand
up and down.
I told you already, this is silly...
Wait. What sorcery is this?

I did it!
I just jerked it completely off!

I did it all by myself!
With this hand right here!

I grabbed my bilbul
like I was strangling a bird.

And I smacked it and I smacked it
and I gave it a flick,
and out came my own labeneh!
Zoey! You have changed my life!

Give a man a vagina
and he will shpichs for a day.

Teach a man to use
his hand as a vagina,
and he will shpichs for a lifetime.
Is something the matter?

That was the guy
from the Lancaster on the phone.

-He's fired us.
-What? Why?

He said he came by
and someome kicked his son.

They've given the contract
to Greenworld Market.

We must get that contract back.
I have to be at the signing.

My stuff lacks the discipline
and the motivation to to this job.

We will see about that.
But from now on, it is my way

or the highwahahtmaa-
fferrohshelechnichway.

There has been a regime change!
You are stocking the shelves.

You, senile Romanian accountant.
You are on the cash register.

The CEO of Green World
does not drive a hybrid!

The chemicals in Green World
produce made this boy grow tits!

-You promise not to steal again?
-I won't. I won't!
Give him one more for fun, Viktor.
Good choice.
Hi, Viktor.

Supreme Grocer. The radicchio
has been washed and sorted,

and the spray hose
has been tightly coiled.

Very good. Now go upstairs and finish
composting the wheatgrass tailings.

-Okay?
-Yes, Supreme Grocer.

-Zoey!
-What? Look...

-It's amazing!
-It's just a little less shit.
Well, thank you.

-Sorry.
-Of course.

-Personal.
-Thank you. Thank you again.

-I have some very good news.
-What is it?

I managed to buy some beards at
the wig store today that are perfect.

No, Nadal, it must be real hair.
And from the head of a great man!

-Like Castro or Gandalf.
-No...

Well done, Nadal.
This beard is perfect.

Those are lovely flowers.
Zoey is thinking of opening

an eco-friendly flower section
to the store.

This is the 5th time you've mentioned
her today. What is going on?

The signing is in two days. Tell me
you're not falling for this woman!
Of course I'm not. This is silly.

Good. All we need to do
is slip into this chapel...

And yet, it's strange. The other day,
I asked her to gobble on my bilbul

and she said, "no", so obviously
I wanted to execute her.

But the thought of her decapitated head
upset me, so I decided not to do it.

When the thought of someone's
decapitated head upsets you,
that is love.

I swear, I don't even like her. She has
the body shape of a 14-year-old boy.

That is a particular weakness of yours.
The Menudo incident?

Those boys had their eyes open.
They knew what they were doing.

You made me hold one
of their eyes open,

so they'd see
what you were doing to them.

They seemed to be having
a pretty good time.

No! Those boys were crying.
Three of them killed themselves!

-Nothing to do with me.
-Everything to do with you!

In their suicide notes
they named you by name!

It's all a rumor.
And you're being silly.

-Go there.
-Okay. Here we go.

-Somebody in here?
-The Sub-Saharans have discovered us!

-What? Okay, okay!
-Hurry, hurry!

Open this door!
Open the door now!
Quick! Plan B!

-Why did you chop off his head?
-You said Plan B!

Plan B was to have coffee and regroup,
not to chop his head off!

Good morning, Nadal!
Wake up! Good morning, Nadal!

-Get this away from me!
-Me and you are quite a team.

You know who else
makes a great team?

-Get it out of here!
-Good one.
Splish splash I was taking a bath!

No! Get it out of here!
That is weird.

I threw in some carob-covered goji
berries, just as a treat. Enjoy.

Thank you. That's very kind of you.
You're a very nice man.

-What the fuck did you call me?
-I said you were nice!

Allison! The Lancaster just called!
We got the contract back!
Great!

Green World is shutting down
their Manhattan store!
I wonder what could have happened?

Be careful with that, sweetheart.
We're going to have a nice big salad.
Celebratory cuddle?

-You smell bad.
-I know.

Somebody help!
My wife is in labor!
Oh, my God!

Baby? The ambulance
can't be here for 20 minutes.

-Can you hold it?
-I can't hold it! It's coming out!

Does anyone have
any medical experience?

I was Wadiya's Chief Surgeon
for the last 22 years.

-Please help us. Please.
-Allison, they need your help.
Are you okay?

-What are you doing?
-Sorry! Old habits die hard.

-All right, I'm going in.
-That's the wrong hole!

You just put your fist up
the wrong hole.

If I had a dollar for every time
I heard that.

-Get it outta there.
-Going in again.

-Still my asshole!
-What is wrong with you, man?

-You just put it in my asshole again!
-Just go up from where you are.

The good news is your prostate
is completely healthy.

-That's good.
-Going in again.

-Hold on.
-What are you...

Allison, stop it!
You need two hands!

-But I'm in the middle of the text.
-It's coming out!
Where is that coming from?

-I'm gonna have to take this call.
-Is there a phone in my body?

-What are you doing?
-I'm in the Lincoln Tunnel.

-What? We need to talk for a minute.
-Nadal. I'll speak to you later, okay?
Stop talking to my vagina!

Zoey, the baby's stuck. I need you
to put your hand in and help me.
Come on! Don't be scared!

-Put it right there on the right side.
-Oh, my gosh!

-I think I feel an arm!
-That's my finger.

Excuse me. You make a really
cute couple together.

But could you finish doing this when
you're not elbow-deep in my pussy?

-Okay, Allison, you've got the head?
-I've got the head.
Come on, push!
Where are the rebel bases?
Sorry, sorry.

-Wait, I can see the head!
-I can't push anymore!
You did it!
I sentence you to life.

-It's still attached!
-Sorry. Oh, no.

-What's wrong?
-I'm sorry. It's bad news.
It's a girl.

-Where's the trash can?
-No! That's what we wanted!
We'll take her. Oh, baby.

You were so amazing down there.
You saved a little person's life.

-It feels so nice to kiss you.
-I know. It's nice to kiss you, too.

I love the hugging.
I just came.
I don't care. Lie back.

-Okay.
-This is going to be amazing for you.
See you in 15 minutes.
Okay.
Wait, wait.

Allison, before we go any further,
there's something I want to tell you.

-You've got a dick. I knew it.
-Allison, I don't have a dick.

-Great!
-What I wanted to tell you was this.

I really want to be with you,
Allison Burgers.
Zoey, I'm not really Allison Burgers.
I'm actually a little somebody called
Admiral General Aladeen.

-No, what's your real name?
-Wait, this will convince you.
Look, it's me!

The weapons inspectors
will bathe in their own blood!

-That's your beard?
-No, no, no! It's not my beard.

My friend chopped the head
off Morgan Freeman.

-You're a murderer!
-No, no, no!

You were just using me
to get access to that hotel!

No! Zoey, I'm attracted to you
in a really fucked-up way.

Oh, my God! I'm canceling
that contract tomorrow!

-No! What have I ever done wrong?
-You lied to me!

-And you're wanted for war crimes!
-That stuff never sticks.

You need to leave now.
-Okay.
I'll go.

p.span: With the signing of the constitution
democracy in Wadiya is hours away,
people are in the streets celebrating.

div.p:
-Good-bye!
-Stop, wait! What are you doing?

-I am executing myself!
-What? Why?

-Because no one has ever loved me!
-Your father would be ashamed of you!
I don't want to be like my father!

-I don't want to be a dictator anymore!
-What's that now?

I've been on a spiritual journey,
man, like "Eat, Pray, Love".
Have you gone insane?

I now know that on the outside,
I am a bit of a cocksucker.

-Yeah.
-But deep down I'm nice.

-Not really.
-Yes, I'm like mafroom.

Hard and spiky on the outside,
but soft and really mushy on the in.

You're not like mafroom at all.
You're like an onion.

An outer layer of cocksucker,
and when you peel it away,

there is 10 more layers
of cocksucker underneath.

-You are such a schmuck!
-Why are you speaking Yiddish?

-I picked it up.
-Who picks up Yiddish?

-I'm in New York!
-We wanna erase them off the map!

I don't like the people,
but I like the words that sound...

Did I not get the Evite
to your bar mitzvah?

-My God!
-You've got real chutzpah saying that!

Where has being
a nice guy gotten you?

Standing on a bridge about to commit
suicide? Still wearing Crocs?
What's wrong with Crocs?

They are the universal symbol
of a man who has given up hope!

You might as well put sweatpants on
and go to Applebee's!

I'll give you that one.
I do look ridiculous.

If you won't come down from there
for yourself, do it for your country.

If this constitution is signed, there
will be women drivers, civil rights!

-What are "civil rights"?
-Tell you later. They're hilarious.

Look. You alone can stop these terrible
things from happening.

You are the last great dictator!
All of the others are gone:
Qaddafi, Saddam, Kim Jong, Cheney.

You are right, Nadal. I will become
the greatest dictator of all.

-The envy of madmen everywhere!
-Yes, Supreme Leader!

From the mountaintops of North Korea
to the jungles of Zimbabwe,

let every child laborer
and sweatshop factory worker sing:

"Oppressed at last!
Oppressed at last!"

"Thank Aladeen,
I am oppressed at last!"

-What are you doing? No, don't fall.
-I'm not doing anything.
Just do like a pull-up.

-You know how you do pull-ups?
-I invented the pull-up.

p.span: We are at the Lancaster Hotel,

div.p:
Eddie Norton, tell Viggo Mortensen
he is on my radar.
How do you say "Fly is in the soup"?

Gentlemen, Tamir. Let me
introduce you to my beautiful wife.

-Mrs. Lao, it is my great pleasure.
-No. She does not speak English.
Watch this. You ugly horse!

She doesn't know. "Ohhh." See?
She goes "Ohhh" all the time.
Watch. Shaved ape.

That is how you intend to get
me across to the Lancaster?

-Absolutely.
-Where'd you get that?

I built it. When I was going
to assassinate you.
You mean my double.
Sure. Yeah.
Bingo!

-Love it!
-Here's what you do.
Zipline across, kill the double,

and then rip up the constitution
in front of the world's media.
Hello, Lancaster!

I don't understand what happened.
My calculations were very precise.

If you lose enough weight,
then the zipline will work.

-Do you have anything in your pockets?
-Let me check.

-What is that?
-It's Vita Coco water.
Why do you have Vita Coco water?

Because it has
as much potassium as three bananas.
The line is still too heavy.

Is there anything else in your pockets
that could be weighing you down?

Then why did you bring
three bananas?

I don't trust the advertising.
I'm naturally suspicious.

Is there anything else you're carrying?
You're still too heavy.
Just this.

What is that, a brick?
Why do you have that?

To balance out
the weight from the other one.

You have two bricks?
Throw them down immediately!

My God, there's a little goat
eating the wire!

-You need to lose weight immediately!
-My pockets are empty. I could poo.

That won't be enough
to make a difference.

Yes, it will.
I haven't gone since Wadiya.

Losing power
has stopped me up like a cork.

Hurry! Come on, Supreme Leader!
Make it rain! Make it rain!
It's out! And it's pointy!
Somebody stop that man!
Yes!
What? No, no!
Supreme Leader!

Get out of here
before Tamir kills you.
Who is Tamir?

The bald bastard who did
all these terrible things to us!
I thought his name was Dennis.

How would you even make that leap?
Tamir to Dennis?

-Go on, get out!
-Come on, Montzi!
Just jump. It's not that far.
Efawadh. It is almost time.
I like goats. I am very stupid.

p.span: in the history of his nation.
Across the globe, people are glued
The people of Wadiya are celebrating
a new chapter in their country.

div.p:
-What might they be saying, Mike?
-I made out the words "Harvey Keitel."

p.span: -Maybe they shared a hot dog together?
That would make sense. He's wiping
the mustard off his face and chest.

div.p:
Excuse me! You have to let me in.
He's trying to stop the signing!
Tamir is now speaking.

Today, we begin a new era.
Wadiya will be open to the world.

Open to the future.
And open for business.

The document is ready to be signed,
Supreme Leader.

What are you doing?
This man is an imposter!

No! This traitor tried to kill me
and had my beard removed!
Look! Arrest the viper Tamir!

p.span: Now in another amazing turn of events,
Tamir Mafraad is being taken away.

div.p:
This comerce-titution is nothing
but a license for oil companies

and foreign interests
to destroy my beloved Wadiya!
Wadiya will remain a dictatorship!

Be quiet.
Why are you guys so anti dictators?

Imagine if America
was a dictatorship.

You could let 1% of the people
have all the nation's wealth.

You could help your rich friends
get richer by cutting their taxes

and bailing them out
when they gamble and lose.

You could ignore the needs of the
poor for healthcare and education.
Your media would appear free

but would secretly be controlled
by one person and his family.

You could wiretap phones,
you could torture foreign prisoners.

You could have rigged elections.
You could lie about why you go to war.

You could fill your prisons
with one particular racial group
and no one would complain!

You could use the media
to scare the people

into supporting policies
that are against their interests.

I know this is hard for you Americans
to imagine, but please try.

I will tell you what democracy is!
Democracy is the worst!

Endless talking and listening
to every stupid opinion!
And everybody's vote counts,

no matter how crippled
or black or female they are.
Democracy...

Democracy has hairy armpits
and could lose five pounds.

Democracy looks like
a midget in a chemo wig.

Democracy kisses you
because she wants to,

not because her father is in
the next room chained to a radiator

with electrodes
attached to his nipples.

Democracy is flawed!
She is not perfect!
But democracy...
I love you!

And that is why I call for real
democracy! A real constitution!
And real elections in Wadiya!
Oh, no! Come on!

Democracy, I will make you
one of my wives.
Okay, only wife. We'll vote on it.

-I'll shave my armpits for you.
-Praise be to the Creator!

And please stop using
that organic deodorant.

You could gas the Kurds
with that stench.

-You died protecting me, Efawadh.
-Hello!

-You are alive?
-It is my job to be shot in the head.

-Is he okay?
-He's fine.

Luckily the bullet
hit him in the brain.
So, what now?

I return to Wadiya
to participate in fair elections.
Good morning, Wadiya!

Let's now look back at the wonderful
events of the past year.

After Wadiya's first free elections,
President Prime Minister

Admiral General Aladeen
won 98.8% of the vote.

But the big story today is the marriage
of President Prime Minister

Admiral General Aladeen
and his new bride, Zoey.
I now pronounce you man and wife.

Are you okay, my love?
What did you step on?

It's my people's tradition.
We always smash a glass at weddings.

-I'm Jewish!
-What?
Mazel tov!

-Are you okay?
-That's fine. It's great!
Come here, my love.

Jachnoon, President
Prime Minister Aladeen.

Jachnoon, Nadal. I have to be back
at the palace in an hour.
Zoey thinks I'm at yoga.

I have great news. We are just days
away from testing the new missiles.

I've reengineered the oxidizing ducts
and the payload delivery systems.

But you'll be happy to know,
the missile is now pointy!

-Who cares if it's pointy?
-What? You care if it's pointy.

Why would I care
about such a trivial detail?

Are you serious right now?
That's why you had me executed!

The shape of the missile has nothing
to do with the payload delivery.

-That's what I said the first time!
-That's what I said, you went crazy.

So, we're opening
300 Women's Centers,

but I'm going to have to take a break
for a little bit because I'm pregnant.
What?
Are you having a boy or an abortion?

Hello, gentlemen.
Are you guys friends of the deceased?

Do you want me to say this
in front of his widow?

-I was his lover.
-No. That is not true.

I saw him perform
with the Globetrotters.

I thought he was outstanding.
I befriended him.
No, it's a different person.

His message of don't worry
and being happy was so powerful.

No, this is Bobby McFerrin.
I told you this outside.
Whatever the scandal you went through,

you're still the best golfer
in the world. Let's go.
Let's rehearse this! Roleplay!
Secretary General, your soldiers will...
I'm so sorry, it was not my fault.

Somebody has set this safety catch
to Aladeen instead of Aladeen.
Look, I mean this whole...
Zoey...
That's some good head!

That is called payback
and it feels so good!

-How did it feel for you?
-I prefer it with goats.

-Where is the Supreme Leader?
-No, no.

-Now that is called payback!
-Oh, great!

Don't touch it.
Don't touch it.

-You don't have to touch it.
-Sorry. I was...

Just give me
a couple of millimeters to myself.
